column5: Experience the beauty of rural North Central Texas, don't just pass through. Awesome estate home in the country between Abilene and Anson, Texas where you can choose 1 of 3 bedrooms and 1 of 2 bathrooms. Each bathroom has a beautifully tiled walk-in shower and granite vanity tops. Living area has high vaulted ceiling and is nicely decorated with big-game mounts. There is also a back den/bar area, an upstairs game-room with pool table and a solarium with hot-tub for your leisure.
